title: the level bots r broke ARAM
body: level bots r broking the ARAM game  they feeding all game but we cant do anything and there have no option to report bots

replies.body: Sad thing is i have seen bot like behavior in normals 5v5 aswell.  Bots shouldn't be aloud at all, every account reported for botting should be investigate and if guilty perma banned for breach of EULA no exceptions
Hey just relax dude....aram's just of ultimate entertainment and there are not much carin' bout the win rate of this mode...

i find between 12:00 AM and 2:00 AM that i am the only real person on a aram team and sometimes one other on the opposing team.just use the bots as meat sheilds and get fed and it makes it more fun.reporting them feels like a waste of time so take the good with the bad :D
